alert.note: Alert for Clark; Coles; Cumberland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 10:57PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coles, southwestern Edgar, northwestern Clark and northern Cumberland Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1057 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lerna, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Charleston around 1105 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ashmore and Westfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 173 and 195. Interstate 70 between mile markers 121 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
